name: Martial
description: For those who master motion itself, striking with purpose, balance, and perfect control.

features.name: Fluid Motion
features.description: You may use Agility instead of Might for Melee Attacks and damage rolls with unarmed or finesse weapons.

features.name: Momentum Strike
features.description: When you take the Disengage action, you may make one unarmed strike as part of that action.

features.name: Focus Within
features.description: Once per short rest, as a Bonus Action, gain advantage on Agility saving throws until the start of your next turn.
